thread.section_title: Costa Rican Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Costa Rican Vacations | www.vacationscostarica.com
thread.title: Heather
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Heather

author: Heather
title: Heather
text:
Wonderful trip!
We had an absolutely wonderful trip thanks to Costa Rican Vacations. The plan they came up for us was a great combination between active and relaxing. They were also easy to work with when our flights kept getting messed up the day we flew down (The airline's fault, not Costa Rican Vacations). They ended up rescheduling some things for us. I was so thankful to have someone else figure out those details so I didn't have to do it.
